colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(BSRUNG 'KHOR BYA TSUL BZLOG RDZAS SNGAGS LA SOGS PA'I BCAS PA 'DI NI, RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO D'I BAm KA RA SHR'I DZ'A NAS MDZAD PA CING, ,BOD KYI LO TZTSA BA BYAMS PA SHES RAB KYI BSGYUR CING ZHUS DAG TE GTAN LA PHAB PA LAGS SO, ,BSHES GNYEN DAM PA MANG PO LA BRGYUD PA NAS BDAG LA TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG POS BZANG POS BDAG LA GNANG NGO, ,BYAD KHA 'BUM BZLOG GI BSRUNG BA'I 'KHOR LO BKA' RGYA MA ZAB RGYA SA MA YA RGYA RGYA RGYA AiTH'I, ,)
